DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to find at least one dose of BMS-955176 that will be safe, effective and tolerable for HIV-1 infected treatment naive adults.
DOC.brief_title: Dose-finding Study of BMS-955176 to Treat HIV-1 Infected Treatment-naive Adults
DOC.criteria: For more information regarding BMS clinical trial participation, please visit www.BMSStudyConnect.com. Men and nonpregnant women, at least 18 years of age Antiretroviral treatmentnaïve; defined as no current or previous exposure to > 1 week of an antiretroviral drug Plasma HIV1 RNA ≥ 1000 copies/mL CD4 Tcell count > 200 cells/mm3 Resistance or partial resistance to any study drug determined by tests at Screening Current or historical genotypic and/or phenotypic drug resistance testing showing certain resistance mutations to EFV, TDF, FTC, Protease Inhibitors Chronic hepatitis B virus (HBV)/ hepatitis C virus (HCV) Blood tests that indicate normal liver function Hemoglobin < 8.0 g/dL, platelets < 50,000 cells/mm3
